channel.title: Object Spawning to Cheatclient?
channel.description:
Well. I want to know how to add Object Spawning to my cheatclient. I'll pay you if you do this for me or make a 100% guide tut on how to do this. NOTE: I'll not go first as we are talking about my weekly payout.
MSN: OddRevenge@TheGamers.nl

item.title: Object Spawning to Cheatclient?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“gelert, post:8, topic:270083”]You would need special software in the client that communicates to the server and tells it to spawn and object at your co ordinates.

I know thats possible but i would have no idea[/quote]

No acually you dont. If we did need it, then why would it be called a “cheat” client.

Read full topic

item.title: Object Spawning to Cheatclient?
item.dc:creator: @TheGamers TheGamers
item.description:
@TheGamers wrote:

-,-! I aint that nub either. I mean Object Spawning so I can spawn object at other peoples server and such via CLIENT. Only I can see the object.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2009, 12:05:31 am[/size][hr]Bumpity Bump

Read full topic

item.title: Object Spawning to Cheatclient?
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

If you want to be able to spawn item/NPC’s, there is already a command added in most servers for this.

Also, you can spawn global objects in the game at regular intervals by adding the desired item to a file named “itemspawnpoints”.

Hope this helped…

Read full topic

pd’s naming for the Map class was something along the lines of ObjectManager, which holds the answer to your dilemma. hope you figure it out

item.title: Object Spawning to Cheatclient?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You won’t be able to physically spawn it server sided through your client so others can see it, only you will be able to see it.

Though I don’t know how to do this, I’m sure at least one person within this forum may be able to assist you :).

Read full topic
